辣.definition: hot (spicy); pungent; (of chili pepper, raw onions etc) to sting; to burn

辣妹.definition: hot chick; sexy girl; abbr. LM

辣妹子.definition: sassy young woman or pretty girl (esp. one from China's spice belt: Guizhou, Hunan, Jiangxi, Sichuan and Yunnan)

辣條.definition: spicy sticks, a snack food similar to beef jerky but made with flour or dried beancurd instead of meat

辣眼睛.definition: (neologism c. 2016) (slang) unpleasant to look at; hard on the eyes

辣雞.definition: spicy chicken; (Internet slang) garbage (pun on 垃圾[la1 ji1])
